{

        {

exec: // Stores the processInstanceId in an environment or global variable

item.name: Get process details with approval tasks
Assign approval task to a user
Get all apporval tasks assigned to an user
Get all apporval tasks owned by an user
Get all apporval tasks owned/assigned for user
Get all tasks APPROVED by User
Get all tasks DECLINED by User
Check calendar sync status for user
Delete Bulk Sync Request for Automation by org id
Enable Bulk Sync Automation Request for Org
Disable Bulk Sync Automation Request for Org
Get Bulk Sync Automation Record for Org
